Attached please find the Government's submission in opposition to the defendant's renewed bail application in 
the above-referenced case. This submission includes the following documents: 
• Cover 
letter 
• Memorandum of Law 
• Government Exhibit A 
• Government Exhibit B 
• 
Proposed Redactions to Memorandum of Law 
Respectfully submitted, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York NY 10007 
EFTA00016023
